Organic carbon stocks in above ground biomass and sediment to 100 cm was highest in saltmarsh (90 t ha–1), followed by mangrove (46 t ha–1), to seagrass (27 t ha–1) and unvegetated habitats (26 t ha–1). Organic carbon varied with depth between habitats, with the majority of differences occurring in the top 20 to 30 cm of the sediment column
